creator: dorlov@crimtan.com
text:
Created attachment 33015
crash_1

We use APR connector for long time with Tomcat-8 and few weeks ago it started to crash time to time. 

Main change which we could see: our SSL traffic endpoint started to receive much more requests than previously.

Crash logs are attached.

It is unlikely that the 1.1.x branch will see any further development. Please switch to the 1.2.x branch. If you still see this problem with the latest 1.2.x release, please open a new issue against 1.2.x and we will investigate.
creator: markt@apache.org
